sprintGoal: Build comprehensive admin tools and moderation dashboard for platform management

tasks.title: Implement admin dashboard backend
tasks.description: Create comprehensive admin dashboard with real-time stats, metrics, and quick actions
acceptanceCriteria: Key metrics: DAU, MAU, WAU, MRR, ARPU, NPS, retention_rate
Growth charts: users, content, revenue over time
Alerts: errors, spam reports, abuse flags
Quick stats: total_users, total_articles, total_topics, total_jobs, total_applications
Recent activity feed: new users, new content, reports
System health: API response times, error rates, database size

technicalNotes.metrics: Precompute daily via cron, store in platform_metrics table
technicalNotes.realtime: Use Redis for current counters (users_online, posts_per_hour)
technicalNotes.monitoring: Integrate with Sentry for error tracking

tasks.title: Build admin dashboard UI
tasks.description: Create visual admin dashboard with charts, metrics cards, and navigation
acceptanceCriteria: Overview section: key metrics cards (DAU, MAU, MRR, etc.)
Growth charts: users, content, revenue (line charts)
Alerts section: high-priority items requiring attention
Quick actions: Create Article, Review Reports, Manage Users
Navigation sidebar: Dashboard, Users, Content, Forum, Jobs, Analytics, Settings

tasks.title: Implement user management admin backend
tasks.description: Create comprehensive user management system for admins
acceptanceCriteria: Search users by: name, email, username, ID
Filter by: role, status, registration_date, activity_level
Sort by: created_at, last_login, reputation, content_count
GET /api/admin/users/:id returns full user profile (including private data)
POST /api/admin/users/:id/suspend suspends user with reason and duration
Bulk operations: export users, bulk status change
Audit log for all admin actions on users

technicalNotes.audit: admin_audit_log table (admin_id, action, target_type, target_id, reason, created_at)

tasks.title: Build user management UI
tasks.description: Create user management interface with search, filters, and actions
acceptanceCriteria: Filters: role, status, registration date range
User table: avatar, name, email, role, status, joined date, last login, actions
Shows: full profile, activity history, content created, reports against user
Actions: Verify Email, Send Message, Suspend, Ban, Delete
Bulk actions: select multiple, export CSV

technicalNotes.components: UserManagement, UserTable, UserDetail, UserActions, SuspendModal, BanModal

tasks.title: Implement content moderation backend
tasks.description: Create unified content moderation system for articles, topics, replies, jobs
acceptanceCriteria: GET /api/admin/content returns all content types for review
Filter by: type (article, topic, reply, job), status, reported, flagged_by_system
Spam detection integration (keyword matching, ML model placeholder)
Auto-flag content with high spam score
Content review workflow: pending â†’ approved/rejected
Notification to author on content action
Audit log for all moderation actions

technicalNotes.spam: Use spam_keywords table, calculate spam_score, flag if > threshold
technicalNotes.workflow: content_status: pending, approved, rejected, hidden, deleted

tasks.title: Build content moderation UI
tasks.description: Create content review interface with queue and bulk actions
acceptanceCriteria: Tabs: All, Pending Review, Reported, Auto-flagged
Content list: thumbnail/icon, title, type badge, author, date, status, spam score
Review panel: full content preview, author info, reports (if any), spam analysis
Actions: Approve, Reject (with reason), Hide, Delete
Reported content shows: report count, reasons, reporters
Spam score visualization (0-100 with color coding)
Quick approve/reject buttons on list items

tasks.title: Implement platform settings backend
tasks.description: Create system for managing platform-wide configuration
acceptanceCriteria: Settings categories: General, Features, Integrations, Security, Email
General: platform_name, tagline, logo, favicon, default_language, timezone
Features: feature flags (forum_enabled, jobs_enabled, etc.), beta features
Integrations: OAuth providers config, analytics IDs, CDN settings, email service
Email: SMTP config, email templates, notification settings

tasks.title: Build platform settings UI
tasks.description: Create settings interface with organized sections
acceptanceCriteria: Tabs: General, Features, Integrations, Security, Email
General: text inputs for name, tagline; file uploads for logo, favicon
Features: toggle switches for feature flags, beta features list
Integrations: forms for OAuth config, analytics, CDN, email service
Security: number inputs for rate limits, timeout; toggles for 2FA, CAPTCHA
Email: SMTP form, template editor, notification toggles
Save button (saves all changes in section)
Test buttons (e.g., Test Email, Test OAuth)

tasks.title: Implement analytics and reports backend
tasks.description: Create platform analytics and custom report generation
acceptanceCriteria: Metrics: user_growth, engagement_trends, content_performance, revenue, top_contributors, traffic_sources
Time series data: daily, weekly, monthly aggregations
GET /api/admin/analytics/custom allows custom date ranges and metric selection
Cohort analysis: retention by signup date
Funnel analysis: user onboarding, job application
Compare periods (e.g., this month vs last month)

technicalNotes.aggregation: Precompute daily via cron, store in analytics_daily table
technicalNotes.custom: Query raw data with date range filters
technicalNotes.export: Generate CSV with data, PDF with charts using jsPDF

tasks.title: Build analytics dashboard UI
acceptanceCriteria: Overview: key metrics cards with trend indicators
User growth chart (line chart, daily/weekly/monthly toggle)
Engagement metrics: DAU/MAU ratio, avg session time, pages per session
Content performance: most viewed articles, top forum topics, trending jobs
Revenue charts: MRR, new subscriptions, churn
Top contributors table (by reputation, posts, etc.)
Custom report builder (select metrics, date range, export)

technicalNotes.charts: Recharts with interactive tooltips and legends

tasks.title: Test admin tools and moderation
tasks.description: Comprehensive testing of admin dashboard, user management, content moderation, settings, and analytics
acceptanceCriteria: Admin dashboard displays all metrics correctly
User management search and filters work
User actions (suspend, ban, delete) execute correctly
Audit log records all admin actions
Content moderation queue displays reported items
Platform settings save and apply correctly
All admin features require admin role

technicalNotes.security: Test that non-admin users cannot access admin routes

notes: Sprint 12 provides admins with powerful tools to manage the platform. Focus on making the interfaces efficient and intuitive. Ensure all admin actions are logged for accountability. Analytics should provide actionable insights for platform growth.
risks: Admin tools complexity may require extensive UX design
Content moderation at scale may need automation (ML spam detection)
Analytics queries may impact database performance - ensure proper indexing
